attributes.action: Stop MPs and Gina miller from stopping a No Deal Evan & Prorogation parliament
attributes.additional_details: We had a democratic vote and the vote was clear and we was told that Government and MPs  Would  implement and deliver on the result of the British people and I feel if this is not past the  Government and MPs/Gina miller will try and over turn the  democratic decision and the will of the British people that we made back in 2016.
attributes.background: Stop MPs and Gina miller from preventing a No Deal Evan if this means Prorogation parliament. I feel if this is not past I feel the  democratic will of the people will not be  adhered to.
